forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm this evening, then some lingering showers still possible overnight. Low around 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with a possible thunderstorm early, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 3C. NNW winds shifting to ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 40F. NNW winds shifting to ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then cloudy with rain likely in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then cloudy with rain likely in the afternoon. High near 50F. SE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 52F. NE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 61F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. SSE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 55F. SSE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 54F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
